Articles.Content: So I have been looking for a mod for extra galaxies but after a lot of research it seems to be that there are many for different versions. I was just wondering if anyone knows the best and most stable mod to get. Thx!
Modding question moved to the modding subforum.

One that may be worth tinkering with is To Boldly Go. It proceduraly generates an entire galaxy (or a couple smaller ones if you prefer) for you to explore. Beware glitches though, it is still in development and most likely will always be.

Kerbal Star Systems(KSS) is a good one, but it may not work well on less powerful machines.

Also, welcome to the forums!

There aren't any completed galaxy mods, but the next highest thing in my opinion would be Kerbal Star Systems. It adds over 100+ bodies in other star systems and overhauls the stock system, so it's a pretty much new start. It also has original textures which To Boldy Go currently lacks
